reference.title: Setting hostnames
reference.shortdesc: Hostnames must be specified prior to being added to a cluster.

section.p: A hostnames are provided when you install a Couchbase Server node, when you add it to an existing cluster for online upgrade, or via a REST API call. If a node restarts, any hostname that you established is used. A hostname cannot be provided for a node that is already part of a Couchbase cluster.

section.title: Response
section.p: If you attempt to specify a hostname once the node is in the cluster, the server rejects the request and returns the following:
section.codeblock: error 400 reason: unknown ["Renaming is disallowed for nodes that are already part of a cluster"]
